If someone could please confirm the audio on this test game works for them I would appreciate it (you need to step outside (for one audio) and then light a fire inside the shack for the other)

I've had to store the files on a free server and point to them there, which isn't how I wanted to do it, but I can't get the audio to work when I upload the whole thing as a zip.
